mapper.select: SELECT s.student_no ,gc.grade_class_no ,sub.subject_no ,s.name ,s.jumin_no ,s.sex ,gc.grade ,gc.grade_class ,sc.semester ,sc.exam ,sc.perfect_standard ,sub.subject_name ,sc.score FROM score sc INNER JOIN student s on s.student_no = sc.student_no INNER JOIN grade_class gc on gc.grade_class_no = sc.grade_class_no INNER JOIN subject sub on sub.subject_no = sc.subject_no ORDER BY student_no desc
